pullrequest.title: Fix for the spawning light issue

content.raw:
This is not consistent in Gazebo but the expected value should be placed as the first parameter. E.g.:

    EXPECT_EQ(0, this->resMsg.id())

This way, if the expectation doesn’t pass, it will properly show what is the expected value and the real value. See other expectations with the same issue.
content.html:
This is not consistent in Gazebo but the expected value should be placed as the first parameter. E.g.:

EXPECT_EQ(0, this->resMsg.id())

This way, if the expectation doesn’t pass, it will properly show what is the expected value and the real value. See other expectations with the same issue.
